recommendations: SHUBHANG KHARE ‚Äú"Extraordinarily coherent" is the first phrase that comes to my mind when I think about Shubham. Shubham and I have worked together for four years. I was particularly impressed by Shubham to handle the toughest situations in an efficient manner. We and our team still miss those golden days spent altogether. Any organisation would be blessed to have Shubham as a manager. ‚Äù
